branches.name: feature/weighted-edits
branches.rationale: To enhance similarity scoring by allowing certain character substitutions to count differently in edit distance calculations.

commits.title: Add distance_with_weights method
commits.body: Implemented the distance_with_weights method to support weighted edits in distance calculations.
per_file_changes: Added distance_with_weights method to handle weighted edits.

commits.title: Update documentation for weighted edits
commits.body: Updated the documentation to include the new distance_with_weights method and its usage.

commits.title: Add tests for weighted edits
commits.body: Created tests to validate the functionality of the distance_with_weights method.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for distance_with_weights method.

branches.name: feature/max-distance-cutoff
branches.rationale: To improve performance by allowing the distance method to return early for inputs exceeding a specified threshold.

commits.title: Add max_dist parameter to distance method
commits.body: Implemented max_dist parameter in the distance method to allow early returns for large distances.
per_file_changes: Added max_dist parameter to distance method.

commits.title: Update documentation for max_dist
commits.body: Updated the documentation to reflect the new max_dist parameter in the distance method.

commits.title: Add tests for max_dist functionality
commits.body: Created tests to validate the functionality of the max_dist parameter in the distance method.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for max_dist parameter.

branches.name: feature/multi-threaded-batch
branches.rationale: To allow faster processing of large lists of strings for similarity ranking through parallel computation.

commits.title: Add batch_distance method for multi-threading
commits.body: Implemented batch_distance method to support multi-threaded computation of distances.
per_file_changes: Added batch_distance method for processing lists in parallel.

commits.title: Update documentation for batch_distance
commits.body: Updated the documentation to include the new batch_distance method and its usage.

commits.title: Add tests for batch_distance
commits.body: Created tests to validate the functionality of the batch_distance method.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for batch_distance method.

branches.name: feature/edit-operations-path
branches.rationale: To provide detailed insights into the edit operations performed during distance calculations.

commits.title: Add distance_with_ops method
commits.body: Implemented distance_with_ops method to output the edit operations path.
per_file_changes: Added distance_with_ops method to return edit operations.

commits.title: Update documentation for distance_with_ops
commits.body: Updated the documentation to include the new distance_with_ops method.

commits.title: Add tests for distance_with_ops
commits.body: Created tests to validate the functionality of the distance_with_ops method.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for distance_with_ops method.

branches.name: feature/unicode-grapheme-clusters
branches.rationale: To ensure multi-codepoint characters are treated as single units in distance calculations, improving correctness.

commits.title: Add use_graphemes parameter
commits.body: Implemented use_graphemes parameter to support grapheme clusters in distance calculations.
per_file_changes: Added use_graphemes parameter to distance methods.

commits.title: Update documentation for use_graphemes
commits.body: Updated the documentation to reflect the new use_graphemes parameter.

commits.title: Add tests for grapheme support
commits.body: Created tests to validate the functionality of the use_graphemes parameter.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for use_graphemes parameter.

branches.name: feature/pure-python-fallback
branches.rationale: To maintain functionality on platforms where the C extension cannot compile, enhancing portability.

commits.title: Add levenshtein_py.dart fallback module
commits.body: Implemented a pure-Python fallback module for compatibility on non-C environments.
per_file_changes: Added levenshtein_py.dart as a fallback for C extension.

commits.title: Update selection logic for fallback
commits.body: Implemented automatic selection logic to choose between C and Python implementations.

commits.title: Update documentation for fallback module
commits.body: Added documentation on the performance trade-off of using the fallback module.
per_file_changes: Added documentation for the fallback module.

branches.name: docs/readme-review-note
branches.rationale: To add a simple line in readme file that says 'reviewed by Bob'.

commits.title: Docs: Add review acknowledgement
commits.body: Added 'reviewed by Bob' line to README.
